title: Hanging, 1900–15
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on velvet
description: Curtain panel with an aquamarine ground printed in a design of water lilies. The top half of the panel has four rows of smaller detached sprigs with leaves. The bottom half shows a pair of larger water lilies emerging from a stylized vase shape. Border is comprised of sprigs inside a baloon-like shapes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, 1900–15.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on velvet. 1988-42-1.
